game.name: Liquor Store Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 자신의 주류 판매점을 엽니 다! 상품 구매,상점 관리,직원 고용. 누가 알 겠어,어쩌면 당신은 작은 가게에서 진짜 알코올 제국을 만들 수있을 것입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open your own Liquor Store! Buy goods, manage your store, hire staff. Who knows, maybe you will be able to make a real alcohol empire out of a small store.

reviewHighlights.text: Is you like shop simulators a lot this will scratch the itch I imagine. Its not terrible or anything, basically supermarket simulator with less stuff...
If you want to open a liquor store, then it would be the best choice currently! The game can run smoothly without taking up too much memory, and the m...
